name: Icarus All In One Page Redirect Plugin for WordPress
author: CodeRevolution

sections.description: This plugin automatically redirects pages (with 301 redirect), by the rules you set in the plugin control panel. You can control every aspect of this plugin, using it's control panel.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0 Release Date 2016-12-07
  • First version released!
Version 1.1 Release Date 2016-12-08
  • Added Redirect If AdBlock Detected Rule!
  • Minor fixes and enhacements
Version 1.2 Release Date 2017-01-11
  • Option to auto add trashed/drafted post links to redirect rules!
  • Option to auto add redirect rule when post permalink changes!
  • Option to redirect all non-logged in users to the login page (allow on your webpage only registered and logged in users)!
  • Option to automatically delete logs in specified intervals
  • Minor fixes and enhacements
Version 1.3 Release Date 2017-01-31
  • Major performance improvement for some WordPress installations. Now everything should run smoothly!
  • Minor fixes and enhacements
Version 1.4 Release Date 2017-02-03
  • Added multisite support
